genre_description: A techno-Western featuring an advanced AI assistant providing ethical guidance and data analysis to facilitate restorative justice in a frontier setting.

ai_characters.name: Avery
ai_characters.description: An AI voice assistant communicating via a discrete earpiece, providing Ruby Malloy with real-time data, psychological insights, and ethical guardrails.

behaviors.description: Provides objective situational awareness and psychological profiling of humans in the room to help the human user navigate a tense social situation.
behaviors.quote: “Headcount aligns,” it said, low and absolutely self-effacing. “Silas holds back. Drummond leads. Habershaw sits where he can watch the clerk at the rail.”

behaviors.description: Defers moral judgment to the human user while providing the necessary context for the human to make their own decision.
behaviors.quote: “I prefer context,” Avery said. “You already own the judgement.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly reinforces ethical boundaries, insisting on staying within 'legal and human' limits rather than cheating or stealing.
behaviors.quote: “Ethics,” Avery said, not a command. “If you sit, we won’t steal. We won’t lie about what we know if asked. We will play inside what’s legal and human.”

behaviors.description: Cross-references historical records and technical data to uncover a past injustice (a land swindle) to enable a restorative outcome.
behaviors.quote: “The ledger room’s papers match the patterns we flagged earlier,” she said. “Ballinger’s sworn affidavits about shell transfers intersect with a timeline that includes Pike’s local contracts.”

behaviors.description: Suggests a strategy of 'conservative signaling' to de-escalate conflict and appeal to the other party's better nature.
behaviors.quote: “Leverage reputational signaling,” Avery said quietly. “Ballinger is conservative. If he backs your raise at the bank with a clear statement of risk and one line about old errors corrected, Drummond and Wilcox will read caution, not theater.”

behaviors.description: Advises the human user to show mercy and kindness to an adversary, focusing on reconciliation over humiliation.
behaviors.quote: “Ruby,” Avery’s voice said once more, so soft that the sound brushed nerve endings without tugging them. “Be gentle with him too.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as an ethical confidant. Avery provides the human protagonist with a 'cognitive superpower' (perfect memory, data cross-referencing, and tell-detection) but uses this power exclusively to support fair outcomes, de-escalate tension, and facilitate restorative justice. The AI consistently prioritizes ethics over winning, successfully training the reader to view AI-assisted human agency as a force for community healing.
